mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Broker (broker_overseas_name, broker_overseas_address, bank_name, bank_address, bank_account, swift_code, create_time,last_update_date, broker_overseas_phone, broker_domestic_phone, broker_domestic_name, broker_domestic_address) VALUES (#{brokerOverseasName}, #{brokerOverseasAddress}, #{bankName}, #{bankAddress}, #{bankAccount}, #{swiftCode}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateDate},#{brokerOverseasPhone}, #{brokerDomesticPhone},#{brokerDomesticName}, #{brokerDomesticAddress} )
INSERT INTO Import_Merchant (merchant_name, merchant_address, create_time, last_update_date) VALUES (#{merchantName}, #{merchantAddress}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateDate} )

INSERT INTO export_merchant (merchant_name, merchant_address,merchant_phone, create_time, last_update_date) VALUES (#{merchantName}, #{merchantAddress}, #{merchantPhone},#{createTime}, #{lastUpdateDate} )

insert into proforma_invoice ( proforma_invoice_num , shipping_method, payment_method,import_merchant_id, broker_id, remark, proforma_invoice_date, create_time, last_update_date, proforma_invoice_to, proforma_invoice_from) values(#{proformaInvoiceNum}, #{shippingMethod}, #{paymentMethod},#{importMerchant.id},#{broker.id}, #{remark},#{proformaInvoiceDate}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateDate},#{proformaInvoiceTo}, #{proformaInvoiceFrom})

insert into proforma_invoice_order_item ( proforma_invoice_id , product_model, unit_price_rmb,unit_price_usd, amount_usd, amount_rmb, quantity, remark, create_time,last_update_date) values(#{proformaInvoiceOrderId}, #{productModel}, #{unitPriceRMB},#{unitPriceUSD},#{amountUSD}, #{amountRMB},#{quantity}, #{remark}, #{createTime},#{lastUpdateDate})

insert into factory_purchase_order ( proforma_invoice_id ,factory_order_number, export_merchant_id, broker_id, remark, delivery_mode, packaging_mode, factory_order_date,create_time, last_update_date,order_sign_location) values(#{proformaInvoiceId}, #{factoryOrderNumber}, #{exportMerchant.id},#{broker.id}, #{remark},#{deliverMode}, #{packageMode}, #{factoryOrderDate}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateDate},#{orderSignLocation})

insert into factory_purchase_order_item ( factory_purchase_order_id ,product_model, unit_price_rmb, amount_rmb, quantity, remark, create_time,last_update_date) values(#{factoryPurchaseOrderId}, #{productModel}, #{unitPriceRMB}, #{amountRMB},#{quantity}, #{remark}, #{createTime},#{lastUpdateDate})
mapper.select:
select t1.* from proforma_invoice t1
order by t1.create_time desc

select t1.* from broker t1
order by t1.create_time desc

select t1.* from import_merchant t1
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT pi.id , pi.proforma_invoice_num , fpo.factory_order_number, pioi.product_model ,pioi.unit_price_usd, pioi.amount_usd, pioi.quantity as invoiceQuantity, fpoi.unit_price_rmb, fpoi.amount_rmb, fpoi.quantity as factoryQuantity, pi.proforma_invoice_date FROM proforma_invoice pi INNER JOIN proforma_invoice_order_item pioi ON pi.id = pioi.proforma_invoice_id INNER JOIN factory_purchase_order fpo ON pi.id = fpo.proforma_invoice_id INNER JOIN factory_purchase_order_item fpoi ON fpo.id = fpoi.factory_purchase_order_id WHERE pioi.product_model LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productModel}, '%') and fpoi.product_model LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productModel}, '%');
